precise.translation[0].definitions[0].de: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct
precise.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: It was difficult to get precise information.
‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise.’
precise.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to emphasize that you are referring to an exact thing
precise.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: At that precise moment, her husband walked in.
The precise cause of the disease is unknown.
the precise location of the ship
the precise nature of their agreement
precise.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who is precise is very careful about small details or about the way they behave
precise.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: with precise movements of his hands
